translated: are performed until the signs are obtained.  Then, in the place where the extensive version of the sutra is performed, the extensive version of the earth ritual,🔽such as the “examination of the site,” and so on, is performed.  Then, the setup of the mandala and the vase is performed.  The mandala is lifted into the sky with the vajra strides.

analyzed: steng du bzhag_/de nas gzungs ldan las byed pas/_/thig gi las la rab tu

translated: Then, with the five-colored line string, the characteristics of the twenty-five [deities]🔽are blessed as appropriate.  The excellent ornaments, garlands, food, drink, cloth,🔽and so on, are arranged.  Then, in order to make a boundary,

analyzed: sogs/_/rgyan mchog legs par dgram par bya/_/de nas mtshhams bcad pa phyi

original: byed

analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba/

analyzed: ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la/_/bstims te mchod pa bzlas pa bya/_/
translated: having dissolved it, make offerings and recite.🔽The three general recitations, such as the four sessions, and so on,

analyzed: srog ldan thun bzhi la sogs pa bzlas pa tshhul gsum gyis/_/yan lag lnga ldan bar chad

analyzed: med/_/ma yengs ngag gis rtag tu 'bad/_/de tshhe rgya rdzas la bod 'bar 'dzum zhal

analyzed: sgra la sogs/_/gal te dbang rab gnas kyi gcig par lung ston gnang thob nas/_/

analyzed: mchod sbyar dngos grub blang bar bya/_/de nas ci rigs las la sbyar/_/bzhi

analyzed: 'khor dbu rgyan phur bu ste/_/gzhan rnams rjes su mthun par brjod/_/bum

analyzed: pa chu dang zho mar dang /_/lji ba shing shun yungs kar nyid/_/rin chen 'phreng

analyzed: ba dbu rgyan dang /_/gdu bu do shal sku rags dang /_/cod pan zhabs gdan

analyzed: rdzas rgyan 'phreng btung ba dang /_/bza' dang bca' dang bgo ba dang /_/rta

analyzed: dbyings ye shes su/_/stong pa chen po'i rab gnas zer stong nyid dran pas sbyangs pa yin/_/
translated: called “the consecration of great emptiness.”🔽The substance is the water of the vase,

analyzed: bam bris gzugs nyid/_/dngos min gzugs brnyan las shes bya/_/om sarba

analyzed: pi ti/_/shing shun lnga yis btab byas la/_/de nas ras kyis legs par phyi/_/
translated: and then wipe well with a cloth.🔽Om sarva tathagata abhisheka samayo hum.

analyzed: om sarba ta tha ga ta a bi she ka sa ma yo hum/_de nas yungs kar rgyal po yis/_/

analyzed: bar chad ma lus skrad par bya/_/stong chen thal mo khong stong phyag rgya sngags swa b+ha wa ldan

analyzed: pas/_/stong pa chen po dag pa bzhin du dag par sbyang /_/sku ni longs spyod byin gyis

analyzed: brlabs sprul pa 'am/_/gang dag de dag nyid du rlob/_/mchod rten rgyu 'bras

translated: are the special deities or the activity deities.🔽The precious wheel, lotus, and sword hand implements are blessed in🔽accord with the above.🔽The scripture is blessed as the Victorious One, the dharmakāya Samantabhadra, the sixth buddha.

analyzed: po drug pa'i/_/sprul pa'i sgron mar yum pha rol phyin ma rlob par bya/_/rdo rje dril bu

original: mi bskyod pa/_/yab yum 'brel par byin gyis brlabs/_/dkyil 'khor de
analyzed: mi bskyod pa/_/yab yum 'brel par byin gyis brlabs/_/dkyil 'khor de
translated: in union.🔽The maṇḍala is blessed as the maṇḍala itself.🔽The crown is blessed as the ten victors, the fathers and mothers.

analyzed: dag nyid du ste/_/dbu rgyan rgyal ba yab yum bcu/_/phur pa khro bor brlab pa

analyzed: thim par bya/_/phyag rgya bzhi ldan bstan pa la/_/sku gsung thugs kyi nges par gsal
translated: The definite clarity of body, speech, and mind🔽is empowered as possessing the three seed syllables.🔽Then the three doors are empowered

original: ldan nyid du brlab/_/de nas sgo gsum 'bru gsum gyis/_/sku gsung thugs
analyzed: ldan nyid du brlab/_/de nas sgo gsum 'bru gsum gyis/_/sku gsung thugs
translated: with the three seed syllables.

analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba/
translated: The stage of the rite of consecration of the net of magical illusion is called “the stage of the rite of consecration of the net of magical illusion.”🔽The three doors are empowered as possessing the three seed syllables.🔽Having invited the ten directions and four times,

original: ldan par byin gyis brlabs nyid du bya/_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi spyan drangs la/_/phyag

analyzed: byed pa yi/_/de dang de'i nus pa can/_/re re sku gsung thugs ldan pas/_/

analyzed: 'gro ba'i don byed nus dbang gi dus su bskur/_/dbang rgyas sbyin sreg rgyas par bya/_/
translated: the extensive empowerment and the extensive burnt offering should be performed.🔽For the emanations other than the six sages,

analyzed: sprul pa thub drug ma yin gzhan dag la/_/yab yum dbu rgyan 'brel pa nyid du bshad/_/

analyzed: thun mong dbang sogs thun mongs ma yin pa'i mnga' dbul ba mtha' yas la/_/rdzogs par bskur bar bshad pa yin/_/bdag gzhan dri ma dag bya'i phyir/_/rin chen
translated: common and uncommon empowerments that are conferred.🔽In order to purify the taints of oneself and others, one should wash with the vase of the seven precious substances.🔽For the benefit of oneself and others, the uncommon empowerment

analyzed: bdun gyi bum pas bkru/_/bdag gzhan don du thun mongs ma yin pa'i dbang yang

analyzed: bskur/_/man+damig sman byugs pas spyan gsal dang /_/snyan gsal shangs
translated: The eyes are clarified by applying eye ointment, the ears are clarified by🔽applying ear ointment, the tongue is clarified by applying mouth ointment,

analyzed: tog ljags dri gsal/_/sprul pa nyid la shes par bya/_/longs spyod rdzogs sku la
translated: and the emanations should be understood.🔽For the saṃbhogakāya, all the substances, such as the precious

analyzed: rin chen 'phreng ba dang /_/gong du bshad pa'i dbu rgyan la sogs pa rdzas rnams kun/_/
translated: garland and the crown explained above,

analyzed: de'i yon tan rdzogs byas nas/_/bdag kyang de 'dra bya ba'i phyir/_/ting
translated: in order to become like that,🔽the mudras of samadhi, the mantras,🔽and the substances should be just like that.

analyzed: 'dzin phyag rgya sngags nyid dang /_/rdzas kyi de lta nyid du bya/_/bdug pa dri chab
translated: Incense, scented water,🔽lamps, the pledge substances, union and liberation, the five desirables,

analyzed: mar me dang /_/dam rdzas sbyor sgrol 'dod yon lnga/_/de nyid yon tan rdzogs
translated: in order to perfect those qualities🔽and to perfect my two accumulations,

analyzed: pa dang /_/bdag gi tshhogs gnyis rdzogs bya'i phyir/_/rim pa nyid du dbul
translated: I offer them in stages.🔽Likewise, clothes, silk, and cushions

analyzed: bar bya/_/de bzhin gos dang dar dang 'phan/_/de yang rim pa bzhin du
translated: should be offered in stages.

translated: the four continents, the ornamented archways, and the celestial mansion, they are offered.🔽The country, house, horses, elephants, servants, wealth,

analyzed: yul khang rta glang bran khol nor/_/bu dang bu mo rang lus dbul/_/tshhogs kyi
translated: sons, daughters, and one’s own body are offered.

analyzed: dkyil 'khor legs par brtag_/de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/_/mchod
translated: The master of the mandala should examine it well, and then🔽he should consecrate it as a place of worship.

translated: Having made offerings in accordance with each of them,🔽the master and the companions and the knowledge consorts🔽should perform all the music and praises of the ten directions and four times,

analyzed: rol mo bstod pa kun byas la/_/dkyil 'khor de la bskor bar bya/_/de nas
translated: and they should circumambulate that mandala.🔽Then, whether in reality or in the shadow,

analyzed: dngos sam grib ma 'ang rung /_/'goms na rgyal ba bsad dang mtshhungs/_/de
translated: if one steps on it, it is like killing the Victorious Ones.

analyzed: nas rang gi sngags ldan pas/_/tish+tha badzras brtan byas la/_/ji srid dgongs
translated: Then, with one’s mantra, “tiṣṭha vajra,” one should stabilize it,🔽and for as long as one wishes, one should stabilize it.

analyzed: pa'i bar du ni/_/de dag brtan par byas pa'am/_/yang na rdzas de ma brlab
translated: Or, without consecrating the substances,🔽for as long as one wishes, one should stabilize it.

analyzed: par/_/de srid brtan par byas pa'am/_/yang na 'khor ba gnas bar du/_/
translated: Or, as long as one remains in samsara,🔽one should remain stable through the power of compassion.

original: thugs rje'i dbang gis brtan par bzhugs/_/gal te zhig par gyur pa'i rdul/_/
analyzed: thugs rje'i dbang gis brtan par bzhugs/_/gal te zhig par gyur pa'i rdul/_/
translated: If the particles of the mandala are scattered,

analyzed: de srid rgyal ba'i gzugs skur nges/_/de re sprul pa bsams yas pa/_/
translated: As long as that is so, it is certain to be the Victor’s form body.🔽Each of those is a limitless emanation,🔽inconceivable due to the power of those to be tamed.

original: 'dul ba'i dbang gis bsam mi khyab/_/sku yi phyag rgya chen po ni/_/yang dag
analyzed: 'dul ba'i dbang gis bsam mi khyab/_/sku yi phyag rgya chen po ni/_/yang dag
translated: The great seal of the body does not move from the🔽authentic dhātu,

analyzed: dbyings las ma g.yos kyang /_/'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir/_/mthun byas
translated: but in order to tame all beings without exception,

analyzed: sku ni sna tshhogs ston/_/de bzhin nyid las g.yos pa med/_/dper na me long
translated: the various bodies are displayed in accordance with🔽those to be tamed.🔽Just as in a mirror or the moon in water,🔽having thus appeared to all,

original: chu zla bzhin/_/de ltar kun tu snang byas nas/_/bdag gzhan don du 'grub
analyzed: chu zla bzhin/_/de ltar kun tu snang byas nas/_/bdag gzhan don du 'grub
translated: may I accomplish the benefit of self and other.🔽kāyavākcitta tiṣṭha vajra🔽Having thus remained,

original: par shog_/ka ya wa ka tshit+ta tish+tha badzra/_de ltar gnas par gyur nas kyang /_/🔽'khor ba ji srid bar du ni/_/rgyal ba'i gzugs sku bsam yas pas/_/bstan
analyzed: par shog_/ka ya wa ka tshit+ta tish+tha badzra/_de ltar gnas par gyur nas kyang /_/ 'khor ba ji srid bar du ni/_/rgyal ba'i gzugs sku bsam yas pas/_/bstan
translated: may I remain for the benefit of migrators🔽through the wheel of the dharma of the Victor’s inconceivable form body for as long as saṃsāra exists.

original: pa chos kyi 'khor lo yis/_/'gro don kun tu gnas par shog_/rgyal ba chos
analyzed: pa chos kyi 'khor lo yis/_/'gro don kun tu gnas par shog_/rgyal ba chos
translated: The Victor turns the wheel of dharma;🔽imagine that it remains like that.

analyzed: kyi 'khor lo bskor/_/de ltar gnas par brtag pa bya/_/de nas lhag ma byin
translated: Then, give the leftovers.

analyzed: byas la/_/bsdu dang go bgo lus bsrung la/_/rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ldan byas la/_/
translated: and possessing the continuity of samādhi,🔽the characteristic of abiding🔽firmly is that the five pristine consciousnesses

analyzed: brtan par gnas pa'i mtshhan nyid sems can ma lus thams cad la/_/ye shes lnga yis kun sgyu 'phrul dra ba rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba/
translated: pervade all sentient beings without exception,🔽but due to the obscuration of one’s concepts,

original: khyab kyang /_/rang gi rnam rtog sgrib byas nas/_/ye shes lnga yi don ma mthong /
analyzed: khyab kyang /_/rang gi rnam rtog sgrib byas nas/_/ye shes lnga yi don ma mthong /
translated: the meaning of the five pristine consciousnesses is not seen.🔽However, because it is free from increase and decrease,

original: 'on kyang 'phel 'grib bral ba'i phyir/_/'khor ba srid dang mya ngan 'das/_/
analyzed: 'on kyang 'phel 'grib bral ba'i phyir/_/'khor ba srid dang mya ngan 'das/_/
translated: samsara and nirvana🔽always abide as long as that exists.

original: de srid bar du rtag par gnas/_/de bzhin rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor yang /_/
analyzed: de srid bar du rtag par gnas/_/de bzhin rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor yang /_/
translated: Likewise, the maṇḍala of the jinas🔽always abides in the continuum of compassion,

original: thugs rje rgyun du gnas gyur nas/_/las dang thugs rje 'phrad pa yis/_/skal
analyzed: thugs rje rgyun du gnas gyur nas/_/las dang thugs rje 'phrad pa yis/_/skal
translated: and when karma and compassion meet,🔽the good fortune of the maṇḍala of the jinas🔽is the arising of the maṇḍala of the body.

analyzed: bar gnas pa smos ci dgos/_/ji ltar nam mkha' dag pa la/_/gzugs sku
translated: What need is there to mention abiding?🔽Just as the form kāya🔽of the sun pervades pure space,🔽similarly, the form kāya arises

analyzed: nyi ma 'bum brdal bzhin/_/de bzhin chos sku dag pa la/_/gzugs sku skye ba

analyzed: bsam mi khyab/_/mtshhan dang dpe byad thams cad ldan/_/gdul bya'i bya ba
translated: Endowed with all the major and minor marks,🔽  Abiding in that way without transition or change🔽  For as long as there are beings to be trained,

analyzed: tshhim bar du/_/'pho 'gyur med par de ltar gnas/_/sa la sogs la phyag
translated: If the mudras of earth and so forth are made,🔽  And the stages of liberation are attained,

original: rgyar byas/_/rnam grol rim pa thob gyur na/_/dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum ye shes
analyzed: rgyar byas/_/rnam grol rim pa thob gyur na/_/dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum ye shes
translated: What need is there to mention the three pure samadhis🔽  Purified by wisdom? That is it.

original: kyis sbyangs pas/_/smos ci dgos te de nyid yin/_/ye shes dag pa'i byin
analyzed: kyis sbyangs pas/_/smos ci dgos te de nyid yin/_/ye shes dag pa'i byin
translated: By the blessing of pure wisdom,🔽  The power of the yoga samadhi,

original: rlabs dang /_/rnal 'byor ting 'dzin mthu byin dang /_/rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i
analyzed: rlabs dang /_/rnal 'byor ting 'dzin mthu byin dang /_/rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i

analyzed: nus mthu yis/_/sgrib pa dag cing tshhogs gnyis rdzogs/_/gang 'chad de yi
translated: The obscurations are purified and the two accumulations are perfected.🔽  Whatever is explained, that is the attainment.🔽  The accomplishment is swift and the time is under one’s control.

original: dngos grub thob/_/sgrub pa myur zhing tshhe la dbang /_/mthar ni skye med rdo rje'i
analyzed: dngos grub thob/_/sgrub pa myur zhing tshhe la dbang /_/mthar ni skye med rdo rje'i

analyzed: sa/_/'grub 'gyur the tshhom med ces bshad/_/theg pa dman par mi skye zhing /_/

original: rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur 'gyur/_/rgyas pa ma byas pa'i skyon dkyil 'khor gzugs
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur 'gyur/_/rgyas pa ma byas pa'i skyon dkyil 'khor gzugs

original: sku la sogs pa/_/rab gnas mthu byin mi gnas par/_/bstod dang bskor ba
analyzed: sku la sogs pa/_/rab gnas mthu byin mi gnas par/_/bstod dang bskor ba
translated: without the power of the blessings of the consecration,🔽without the power to accumulate and write,🔽without the power to praise and circumambulate,

original: ma byas pa/_/bsogs dang bri ba'i nus mthu med/_/de nyid ngal ba don med
analyzed: ma byas pa/_/bsogs dang bri ba'i nus mthu med/_/de nyid ngal ba don med
translated: that effort is meaningless.

original: de/_/rnal 'byor ting 'dzin ldan pa yis/_/sku gzugs rab gnas kyi byin
analyzed: de/_/rnal 'byor ting 'dzin ldan pa yis/_/sku gzugs rab gnas kyi byin
translated: The one who possesses the yoga and samadhi🔽will destroy the consecration of the image🔽by prostrating and making offerings to it.

original: brlabs med pa la/_/phyag 'tshhal mchod pas brlag par 'gyur/_/de phyir🔽'bad de rab gnas bya/_/gang dag dkyil 'khor la sogs rdzas la brten_/_/
analyzed: brlabs med pa la/_/phyag 'tshhal mchod pas brlag par 'gyur/_/de phyir 'bad de rab gnas bya/_/gang dag dkyil 'khor la sogs rdzas la brten_/_/
translated: Therefore,🔽strive in the consecration.🔽Those who desire to accomplish the result🔽in dependence upon the substances of the mandala and so forth

original: de yis 'bras bu sgrub par 'dod pa de don du/_/lung dang rig pa dang man ngag
analyzed: de yis 'bras bu sgrub par 'dod pa de don du/_/lung dang rig pa dang man ngag
translated: should gather the ritual of the consecration of the Magical🔽Net

original: tshhad ma gsum ldan pas/_/sgyu 'phrul rab gnas cho ga legs bsdus pas/
analyzed: tshhad ma gsum ldan pas/_/sgyu 'phrul rab gnas cho ga legs bsdus pas/
translated: with the three valid authorizations of scripture, logic, and upadeshas.🔽Having gained the power of the ability of that meaning,

original: de don nus mthu ldan nas 'gro ba kun/_/yi ge 'khor lo tshhogs chen 'grub par
analyzed: de don nus mthu ldan nas 'gro ba kun/_/yi ge 'khor lo tshhogs chen 'grub par
translated: all migrating beings will accomplish the great assembly of the🔽wheel of syllables.

original: shog_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rab gnas kyi cho ga rnam par bsreg pa gsum dang sbyar ba/_lo rgyus mi gsung slob dpon rgyal ba bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: shog_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rab gnas kyi cho ga rnam par bsreg pa gsum dang sbyar ba/_lo rgyus mi gsung slob dpon rgyal ba bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
translated: The ritual of consecration of the Net of Illusory Manifestations, applied to the three burnings, composed by the master Jayabhadra, who does not speak of the history, is complete.
